heading.title: Adubu Khangbada
heading.subtitle: Nupa-fam leipham amasung oiba fam thourangna thokpa phaoba hinggatpa

steps.title: Nupa-fam Phangba
steps.desc: Nupa-fam gi mangonda nungshibi amasung maramda punsi thokpa punsida hakchang amadi nungshibi

steps.title: Hannaba Yengba
steps.desc: Khurum, khadam amasung tongba thabak punsi thokpa punsida hakchang amadi nungshibi

steps.title: Maringda Yengba
steps.desc: Pham punsi thokpa punsida khurum amasung mangonda nungshibi leiriba phaoba

steps.title: Mapokpagi Phangba
steps.desc: Nupa-fam gi maramda mam pH amasung type-gi nungaiba

cta.title: Nupa-fam leipham amasung oiba thokpa phaoba khangbada?
cta.subtitle: Adubu nupa-fam gi yengba amasung nungshibi thokpa punsi leiriba
